item.description: The goal of 'Come Home, America-Boston' is to build an alliance of non-interventionists from the Left and the Right to help put an end to the dangerous foreign policies of the United States. Join us for a discussion at Doyle's Cafe, Jamaica Plain, on March 10, 7 PM. Two suggested items now on the agenda: A speakers' event at Faneuil Hall in late May. Promoting 'nullification' to end interventionism. Please join 'Come Home, America'. Go to: http://www.meetup.com/CHA-Boston/
item.why: On Feb. 28, 2011, a Rasmussen poll showed that 67% of Americans thought we should mind our own business in the Middle East.
item.name: Organizing a Left-Right Alliance for Non-intervention in Foreign Countries
